term.title: scattering matrix

item.text: The Stokes parameters of scattered light are given by the matrix equation (s0,s1,s2,s3) = F(s00,s10,s20,s30) is comprised of 16 scattering matrix elements. These matrix elements, which may originate in theory or experiment, provide a complete description of the scattered radiation in terms of the incident radiation.
